enhanced_summary: Galileo Mining Ltd is an Australian-based company focused on the exploration and development of mineral resources, primarily targeting nickel, cobalt, and copper. The company aims to discover and develop economically viable mineral deposits to create shareholder value.

key_people.name: Brad Underwood
key_people.bio: Brad Underwood has over 20 years of experience in the mining industry, specializing in exploration and project development. He has been instrumental in advancing Galileo Mining's exploration projects and strategic direction.

key_people.name: Mark Pitts
key_people.bio: Mark Pitts is a Chartered Accountant with extensive experience in corporate governance and financial management within the mining sector. He provides strategic advice and ensures compliance with regulatory requirements.
